Entries.Phone_Marlon_Open: Yes, this is Magnus... you've lost something in the mines? Very well. I can summon it back... for a price.
Entries.Phone_Marlon_AlreadyRecovering: Hello. Yes, my sprites are searching the mines as we speak. No cause for alarm. *click*
Entries.Phone_Marlon_NoDeathItems: I don't seem to have any indication that you've lost anything. If you ever do need my services, I'll still be here. *click*

Entries.ShopMenu.cs.11521: The caves can be dangerous. Don't go losing an eye like Marlon.
Entries.ItemRecovery_Description: Lost some items? A shame. I may recover one of them, for a fee. Choose wisely.
Entries.ItemRecovery_Engaged: Very well, I'll see if I can find your lost {0} tonight. I'll drop it off in your mailbox tomorrow morning.
Entries.ItemRecovery_Engaged_Stack: Very well, I'll see if I can find your lost {0} tonight. I'll drop them off in your mailbox tomorrow morning.

Entries.MarlonRecovery: @,^Found your lost item.^^In the future, do take care.^   -M. Rasmodius%item itemRecovery %%[#]Magnus Found Your Item
Entries.guildQuest: I see you've been exploring the old mine. You've got the adventurer's spirit, that much I can tell.^If you can slay 10 slimes, you'll have earned your place in my adventurer's guild. ^Be careful.    -Marlon %item quest 15 true %%[#]Quest To Slay Slimes
Entries.passedOut4: @, ^^While scanning the Valley last night I found your collapsed body via one of my manifests. I have returned you to your home. Take care.^^     -M. Rasmodius[#]Note From Magnus
